title: recreational vehicle
fullText:
1 trailer designed to be towed by a road vehicle, often used for living and accommodation, and has the provision for, or is intended for connection to a low voltage supply from an external source
2 self-propelled vehicle with the same features
Note 1 to entry: Vehicles such as mobile site offices and similar, that are not used for living accommodation or recreational purposes, are not deemed to be recreational vehicles, see vehicles (1.4.26).
